Hi! I'm now trying to use <https://github.com/JuliaGeometry/GeometryBasics.jl|GeometryBasics.jl>, and I have some questions.
• Why is `+(a::Point, b::Point)` defined? I think they're elements of Affine space, and we can't add them.
• Why is `Rect(Point(3,1), Vec(1,2)) # arguments are origin, widths` makes error? I think the first argument should be `Point` . (`Rect(Vec(3,1), Vec(1,2))` doesn't make error, but I think it doesn't make sense, I guess)
